author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
PR 80x for DQM in HI run.

It has a change in the Layer2 emulator (to be ran in DQM) so that towers
considered in TowerCount algorithm are upto EtaMax+1.

etSumEtaMax  in configuration changed from 28 to 27, for the TowerCount algo,
to follow what is used in FW.
title: Pr80x dqm emulator heavyion TowerCount-No-HF
